content:
Hey Friends!

Is there any history on why US Core doesn't mention the combination of search parameters required to retrieve a patient's current problem list? It seems like this is a pretty practical capability.

Specifically, why isn't patient+category+clinical_status a recommended search parameter combination, here: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition-us-core-condition.html#mandatory-search-parameters ?
It would at least get pretty unwieldy to specify every specific combination. Is there an expectation that servers should support combinations of recommended search parameter combinations?
Hey Isaac ! I suggest these are great ballot comments for a spec that is going to ballot. The simple answer btw is that the community has never asked for them.

thanks, Eric, I just wasn't sure if we'd had a months long discussion three years ago and arrived at the current scenario intentionally. For server implementers, do you support searching on Condition with this combination of parameters: patient+category+clinical_status ?
